Comments_List: Knowledge surrounding the fundamental forces, which hold together all things.
Very well taught and extremely methodical. Could have been more elucidating for psets, but overall was extremely well done.
This is a cool class! You get to learn chemistry things in a different way. The class is mostly grad students, but Udo makes the material very accessible to undergrads as well.
Yes, Udo is a phenomenal teacher. He loves lecturing about the material and goes very in depth on each subject. Honestly, one of the best lecturers in the department.
